description.displayText: Karmen has been taking care of our now 2 year old son for the last year and a half and they are best friends! We're sad to be moving out of the area and to lose Karmen. She is so calm and patient with him - they laugh all day long. Karmen is never late and has never called off. Were so fortunate to have had her as part of our family!
description.originalText: Karmen has been taking care of our now 2 year old son for the last year and a half and they are best friends! We're sad to be moving out of the area and to lose Karmen. She is so calm and patient with him - they laugh all day long. Karmen is never late and has never called off. Were so fortunate to have had her as part of our family!

description.displayText: It is always a pleasant surprise when you can find not only an incredible nanny but a life long friend and I found that when I hired Karmen.  Karmen was such a gem and an incredible nanny. She worked with my son T. for 2 years from the age of 14 months to 3 and a half years old. Karmen both creatively and cognitively worked with T., prepared his food, took him to appointments, the park and play dates. Karmen helped T. transition wonderfully to preschool. My husband, T. and I unfortunately relocated to  Portland, Oregon so we were no longer able to utilize Karmen's services. However we still keep in touch and we will always appreciate how helpful and wonderful she was with T.

description.displayText: My son is very shy around adults and can have quite of a temper, but Karmen was very patient and was able to get him to open up. By the time it was time to leave he didn't even want to leave! She's great.
